text.content:
Review and remediate critical issues identified in DriveSheetsSync comprehensive audit.

**Key Findings:**
- 168 duplicate folders (70% of databases)
- 6 missing CSV files
- 101 missing archive folders
- 274 orphaned files

**Required Actions:**
1. Review handoff document: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_TROUBLESHOOTING_HANDOFF.md
2. Review audit report: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_AUDIT_REPORT.md
3. Review audit data: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_AUDIT_DATA.json
4. Create Issues+Questions entries for each critical issue
5. Implement fixes to DriveSheetsSync script
6. Perform data cleanup operations
7. Validate fixes with re-audit

**Priority:** Start with P0 issues (duplicate folders, missing CSV files)

**Resources:**
- Handoff: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_TROUBLESHOOTING_HANDOFF.md
- Audit Report: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_AUDIT_REPORT.md
- Audit Data: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/DRIVESHEETSSYNC_AUDIT_DATA.json
- Script: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/gas-scripts/drive-sheets-sync/Code.gs
